name: Mount, Communal
book: Pathfinder Roleplaying Game Ultimate Combat. © 2011, Paizo Publishing, LLC
text: This spell functions like mount, except you can summon up to six light horses or ponies, and you divide the duration in 2-hour increments among the steeds summoned.
text_zh: 这个法术工作方式如同召唤坐骑 (Mount)，不过你可以召唤最多6匹轻型马或矮种马，然后你可以将法术持续时间以2小时为单位分配给每一只召唤物。
